S02vadhdhdu:8_13_1: prakāśitā anumoditā prabhāvitā praśastā saṃvarṇitā vivṛtā uttānīkṛtā ārocitā ākhyātā
S02vadhdhdu:8_13_3: hitāya sukhāya saṃbhogāya paribhogāya kṣemāya ceti /
S02vadhdhdu:8_14: ānanda āha ḥ udgṛhītā me bhagavann iyaṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇī dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā anumoditā manasā suparicintitā ca sādhu bhagavann iti /
S02vadhdhdu:9_0_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ
S02vadhdhdu:9_0_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya kṛtakarapuṭo bhūtvā bhagavataḥ
S02vadhdhdu:9_0_2: mukham avalokya yadīdānīṃ tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ gāthā abhāṣat /
S02vadhdhdu:10_1: āpūrṇam asmin gṛheṣu maṇḍalaṃ namo 'stu te śrīvasudhāraṇī sadā //
S02vadhdhdu:11_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhagavato 'ntikāt śrutvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditā prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavantam etad avocat /
S02vadhdhdu:11_1: ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavanta dharmaparyāyaḥ kathaṃ bhagavan dhārayāmy enaṃ dharmaparyāyam /
S02vadhdhdu:11_2_0: bhagavān āha ḥ sucandragṛhapatiparipṛcchety api ānanda dhāraya sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaratnanidhānam
S02vadhdhdu:11_2_1: ity api dhāraya sarvatathāgatapraśastety api dhāraya sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhitā vasudhārādhāraṇīkalpam
S02vadhdhdu:12_0_0: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā āyuṣmān ānandas te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ
S02vadhdhdu:12_0_1: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam
S02vadhdhdu:14_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
S02vadhdhdu:14_1: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
